identity.name: E1 - Obsidian Glass
identity.description: A high-contrast, premium tech aesthetic that merges deep obsidian backgrounds with electric neon accents and glassmorphism. Designed for the Kenyan market with a global, futuristic edge.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Apple Store' minimalism with 'Cyberpunk' vibrancy.
Content is King: Products are the heroes; UI recedes into the dark.
Zoom In: Macro photography for product details.
Negative Space: Luxurious black voids to create focus.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H6. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, UI text, and data.

usage_rules: Backgrounds: Always use #050505 for the main page background.
Cards: Use #09090b with a 1px border of #27272a (Zinc 800).
Text: Headings in #f8fafc, Body in #94a3b8. NEVER use pure white (#ffffff) for body text.
Accents: Use Neon Indigo (#6366f1) for primary CTAs. Use Electric Cyan (#06b6d4) for tech highlights/glows.

layout.spacing_scale: Tailwind default, but prioritize p-8, p-12, p-16 for section gaps.

grids.marketing: The 'Tetris' Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8. Mix col-span-8 (Hero) with col-span-4 (Detail).
grids.dashboard: High Density Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4. Use col-span-full for main charts.

buttons.primary: bg-primary-main hover:bg-primary-light text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold transition-all shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(99,102,241,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(99,102,241,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-neutral-700 text-neutral-200 hover:border-neutral-500 rounded-full px-8 py-3 transition-all

cards.style: bg-background-paper border border-neutral-800 rounded-2xl p-6 hover:border-primary-main/50 transition-colors group relative overflow-hidden
cards.effect: Add a subtle radial gradient glow on hover.

inputs.style: bg-neutral-900/50 border border-neutral-800 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 text-neutral-200 focus:border-primary-main focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary-main outline-none transition-all placeholder:text-neutral-600

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle mesh gradients in the background: 'bg-[radial-gradient(ellipse_at_top,_var(--tw-gradient-stops))] from-primary-900/20 via-background to-background'
visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay at 2% opacity to reduce banding.

media.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Stroke width: 1.5px.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is at least Slate-400 on dark backgrounds.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings using the Primary color.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' and 'clsx' 'tailwind-merge' if not present.
2. THEME: Configure tailwind.config.js to use the specific colors defined above. Extend the theme, do not overwrite.
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts imports to index.css.
4. LAYOUT: Build the 'Tetris Grid' for the Landing Page Hero section.
5. DASHBOARD: Use the 'High Density Grid' for the Admin Dashboard.
6. COMPONENTS: Create a reusable 'GlassCard' component that implements the glassmorphism styles.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for placeholders. Do not use gray boxes.
8. CRITICAL: Ensure the 'Dark Mode' is the DEFAULT and ONLY mode for this version (as per 'Obsidian Glass' theme).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Dark Mode Mastery: Avoid pure black (#000000) for cards; use #09090b.
Micro-Interactions: Every button must have a hover state (scale, glow, or color shift).
Data-TestID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
